description: AIKEA is a home camera powered by AI which can capture important moments automatically for you.

key_features.title: SIMPLE & ELEGANT
key_features.description: AIKEA is built with simple concept. The sensor-like appearance and shape allow you to place it anywhere at home.

key_features.title: PRIVACY BY DESIGN
key_features.description: It is created with built-in AI. All intelligent computation is done locally inside AIKEA to protect your privacy. No cloud collection of your home videos.

key_features.title: MULTIPLE TARGETS
key_features.description: AIKEA supports detection of 20+ targets including dogs, cats, intruders, cars, babies and bicycles. You may easily switch between targets based on your need.

key_features.title: OPEN SOURCE
key_features.description: AIKEA is 100% open-sourced and users may customize AIKEA in the best you prefer, like turning it into a dinosaur. All components are compatible with Raspberry Pi and are reusable in order to reduce the electronic wastes.

how_it_works: An image is sent to your Telegram account
achievements: The only crowdfunded product mentioned in the Internet Health Report 2019 published by Mozilla

pricing.name: AIKEA Full Kit
pricing.description: Get one AIKEA kit to protect your home at a discounted rate

pricing.name: AIKEA Light Kit
pricing.description: With this reward tier, your RPi Laying around at home can be an AIKEA!

company_info.name: DT42
company_info.focus: Building lightweight and intelligent edge AI solutions. Our system can run on mobile phones and IOT devices to allow AI run without internet connections.
company_info.vision: In the 5G era, our solution is the best partner for mobility, smart city, and factory automation.
company_info.partnerships: DT42 is an official partner of NVIDIA, Intel, Qualcomm and arm.
company_info.product_statement: AIKEA is the key product built by DT42 to provide elegant and simple edge AI experience to customers
